chunk:
Shikai Cbd Cream With Borage Oil

Brand: Shikai

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: PURIFIED WATER (AQUA), JOJOBA SEED OIL (SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS), GLYCERYL STEARATE SE, GLYCERIN, BORAGE SEED OIL (BORAGO OFFICINALIS), AVOCADO OIL (PERSEA GRATISSIMA), SHEA BUTTER (BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII FRUIT), CETYL ALCOHOL (VEGETABLE WAX), VITAMIN E

ABLE WAX), VITAMIN E ACETATE (TOCOPHERYL ACETATE), PHENOXYETHANOL, BATYL ALCOHOL (VEGETABLE WAX), PURE CBD ISOLATE (CANNIBIDIOL) FROM HEMP, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
